attrs.name: 3d-aspect3dAspect
attrs.desc: Sets the graph's 3D aspect.  3D graphs can be displayed in either true 3D or in an isometric 3D view.  True 3D graphs allow more view options.  For more information, see 3d-aspect.

attrs.name: animate-typeanimateType
attrs.desc: Sets if graph's animation runs on every chart reload/zoom or only on the first rendering.

attrs.name: arrows
attrs.desc: Acts as a container for any number of arrow objects, which can be styled and placed anywhere on your chart.  For more information, see arrows.

attrs.name: async
attrs.desc: Sets if graph's rendering is being done in one step or sequential. Useful for big charts or rendering on slow browsers (old Internet Explorer versions).

attrs.name: async
attrs.desc: Sets if the graph is rendered in async mode. If specified, overrides the global zingchart.ASYNC parameter.

attrs.name: crosshair-xcrosshairX
attrs.desc: Sets the definition for the graph's X crosshair object. For more information, see crosshair-x, crosshair-y.

attrs.name: crosshair-ycrosshairY
attrs.desc: Sets the definition for the graph's Y crosshair object. For more information, see crosshair-x, crosshair-y.

attrs.name: csv
attrs.desc: Sets a CSV data source for the data of the chart.  For more information, see CSV.

attrs.name: guide
attrs.desc: When used outside of a scale object, acts similar to crosshair-x in that it can be used to style the X crosshair.  For more information, see crosshair-x.

attrs.name: images
attrs.desc: Acts as a container for any number of image objects, which can be styled and placed anywhere on your chart.  For more information, see images.

attrs.name: labels
attrs.desc: Acts as a container for any number of label objects, which can be styled and placed anywhere on your chart.  For more information, see labels.

attrs.name: legend
attrs.desc: Allows you to customize the appearance and functionality of your chart's legend object.  For more information, see legend.

attrs.name: palette
attrs.desc: Quick attribute for setting up a set of colors for the plot. The attribute sets the base colors, the actual palette used is being dynamically generated starting from the base colors and setting the white color to the text.

attrs.name: plot
attrs.desc: Allows you to configure a number of different attributes that will affect every plotted value or individual series, depending on its placement.  For more information, see plot.

attrs.name: plotarea
attrs.desc: Allows you to customize a chart's plotarea, which is the area behind your plotted values.  For more information, see plotarea.

attrs.name: preview
attrs.desc: Allows you to customize the appearance of a graph preview, which will allow users to see a small preview of an entire chart at all times as well as select which portion of a chart to display.  For more information, see preview.

attrs.name: refresh
attrs.desc: When pulling data from an external source, this will allow you to control the automated data refresh system.  For more information, see refresh.

attrs.name: scale
attrs.desc: Sets the definition for the graph's matrix scale, in case more than one dataset exists.

attrs.name: scale-kscaleK
attrs.desc: Sets the definition for the graph's key scale.

attrs.name: scale-rscaleR
attrs.desc: Allows you to customize the appearance of the R scale, which is primarily used in gauge type charts.  For more information, see scale-r.

attrs.name: scale-vscaleV
attrs.desc: Sets the definition for the graph's value scale.

attrs.name: scale-xscaleX
attrs.desc: Allows you to customize a chart's primary X scale.  For more information, see scale-x, scale-x-n.

attrs.name: scale-x-nscaleXN
attrs.desc: Allows you to customize a chart's subsequent X scales, where n represents the chart's scale number.  For more information, see scale-x, scale-x-n.

attrs.name: scale-yscaleY
attrs.desc: Allows you to customize a chart's primary Y scale.  For more information, see scale-y, scale-y-n.

attrs.name: scale-y-nscaleYN
attrs.desc: Allows you to customize a chart's subsequent Y scales, where n represents the chart's scale number.  For more information, see scale-y, scale-y-n.

attrs.name: scroll-xscrollX
attrs.desc: Allows you to customize the appearance of the x axis scroll bar and handle.  For more information, see scroll-x/scroll-y.

attrs.name: scroll-yscrollY
attrs.desc: Allows you to customize the appearance of the y axis scroll bar and handle.  For more information, see scroll-x/scroll-y.

attrs.name: series
attrs.desc: Acts as a container to hold that chart's data values.  Also allows you to set various attributes separately for individual series.  For more information, see series.

attrs.name: shapes
attrs.desc: Acts as a container for any number of shape objects, which can be styled and placed anywhere on your chart.  For more information, see shapes.

attrs.name: source
attrs.desc: Allows you to customize a chart's source.  For more information, see source.

attrs.name: stack-typestackType
attrs.desc: Sets the chart's stacking method (normal stacking or always stacked up to 100%).

attrs.name: stacked
attrs.desc: Sets if the graph plots are stacked or not. See also plot:stacked.

attrs.name: subtitle
attrs.desc: Allows you to customize a chart's subtitle.  For more information, see subtitle.

attrs.name: title
attrs.desc: Allows you to customize a chart's title.  For more information, see title.

attrs.name: tooltip
attrs.desc: Sets the definition for the graph's tooltip object.

attrs.name: type
attrs.desc: Sets the type of the graph.

attrs.name: utc
attrs.desc: Sets if the timestamps contained in the series data should be treated as UTC or local times.

attrs.name: widgets
attrs.desc: Sets the graph's widgets collection.

attrs.name: zoom
attrs.desc: Sets the definition for the graph's zoom object.

attrs.name: alpha
attrs.desc: Sets the transparency of the object. Values must range between 0.0 and 1.0, with 0.0 being completely invisible and 1.0 being completely opaque. Please note that values also require the leading 0 before the decimal.

attrs.name: background-colorbackgroundColor
attrs.desc: Sets the background color of the object.  Colors can be entered by name (e.g. "red", "blue", "yellow"), in hexadecimal notation (e.g. "#FF0000", "#0000FF", "#FFFF00"), or in RGB notation (e.g. "rgb(255,0,0)", "rgb(0,0,255)", "rgb(255,255,0)").  One color will set a solid background color, two colors will, by default, create a horizontal gradient.  For more complex gradients, use gradient-colors and gradient-stops.

attrs.name: background-color-1backgroundColor1
attrs.desc: Sets the first color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.  To be used with background-color-2.

attrs.name: background-color-2backgroundColor2
attrs.desc: Sets the second color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.  To be used with background-color-1.

attrs.name: background-fitbackgroundFit
attrs.desc: Sets the direction/s on which the background image is being "stretched".

attrs.name: background-imagebackgroundImage
attrs.desc: Sets a background image for the object. Value can be a local file or a web image's location.

attrs.name: background-positionbackgroundPosition
attrs.desc: Sets the position of the background when the background-repeat value is no-repeat.

attrs.name: background-repeatbackgroundRepeat
attrs.desc: Sets the repeating mode for the background image.

attrs.name: border-bottomborderBottom
attrs.desc: Sets the object's bottom border style.  Accepts solid, dashed, and dotted styles.

attrs.name: border-colorborderColor
attrs.desc: Sets the border color of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-color for closed shapes.

attrs.name: border-leftborderLeft
attrs.desc: Sets the object's left border style.   Accepts solid, dashed, and dotted styles.

attrs.name: border-radiusborderRadius
attrs.desc: Sets the object's border radius, for rounded corners.  Larger values create rounder corners, while smaller values create sharper corners.  A single value will affect all 4 corners, while multiple values will have separate effects on each corner, with the first value affecting the top-left corner, the second value affecting the top-right corner, and so on, in a clockwise direction. A negative value will cut a corner off without rounding.

attrs.name: border-radius-bottom-leftborderRadiusBottomLeft
attrs.desc: Sets the object's bottom-left border radius, for rounded corners.  Larger values create rounder corners, while smaller values create sharper corners.  A negative value will cut a corner off without rounding.

attrs.name: border-radius-bottom-rightborderRadiusBottomRight
attrs.desc: Sets the object's bottom-right border radius, for rounded corners.  Larger values create rounder corners, while smaller values create sharper corners.  A negative value will cut a corner off without rounding.

attrs.name: border-radius-top-leftborderRadiusTopLeft
attrs.desc: Sets the object's top-left border radius, for rounded corners.  Larger values create rounder corners, while smaller values create sharper corners.  A negative value will cut a corner off without rounding.

attrs.name: border-radius-top-rightborderRadiusTopRight
attrs.desc: Sets the object's top-right border radius, for rounded corners.  Larger values create rounder corners, while smaller values create sharper corners.  A negative value will cut a corner off without rounding.

attrs.name: border-rightborderRight
attrs.desc: Sets the object's right border style.  Accepts solid, dashed, and dotted styles.

attrs.name: border-topborderTop
attrs.desc: Sets the object's top border style.  Values must include the border width, style, and color.  Accepts solid, dashed, and dotted styles.

attrs.name: border-widthborderWidth
attrs.desc: Sets the border width of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-width for closed shapes.

attrs.name: callout
attrs.desc: Sets whether an object will have a callout arrow or not.

attrs.name: callout-extensioncalloutExtension
attrs.desc: Sets the length of the extension that extends beyond the tip of the callout arrow.

attrs.name: callout-heightcalloutHeight
attrs.desc: Sets the height of the object's callout arrow.  A larger value will create a taller callout arrow.

attrs.name: callout-hookcalloutHook
attrs.desc: Sets the point of the tip of the callout arrow to a specified coordinate on the chart, with the starting point of [0,0] being the top left corner of the chart.

attrs.name: callout-offsetcalloutOffset
attrs.desc: Sets the offset along the callout direction of the arrow's base.  Positive and negative values can be used to offset the callout arrow up, down, left, or right depending on the callout-position.

attrs.name: callout-positioncalloutPosition
attrs.desc: Sets the position for the object's callout arrow.  The position is "bottom" by default.

attrs.name: callout-widthcalloutWidth
attrs.desc: Sets the width of the object's callout arrow.  A larger value will create a wider callout arrow.

attrs.name: fill-anglefillAngle
attrs.desc: Sets the angle of the axis along which the linear gradient is drawn.

attrs.name: fill-offset-xfillOffsetX
attrs.desc: Sets an X offset to apply to the fill.

attrs.name: fill-offset-yfillOffsetY
attrs.desc: Sets an Y offset to apply to the fill.

attrs.name: fill-typefillType
attrs.desc: Sets the background gradient fill type to either linear or radial.

attrs.name: gradient-colorsgradientColors
attrs.desc: Sets a set of colors for a complex background gradient consisting of 2 or more colors. To be used with gradient-stops.

attrs.name: gradient-stopsgradientStops
attrs.desc: Sets the gradient stops for a complex background gradient consisting of 2 or more colors. To be used with gradient-colors.

attrs.name: height
attrs.desc: Sets the object's height.

attrs.name: item
attrs.desc: Sets the item id of the map on which the object/shape is being added.

attrs.name: map
attrs.desc: Sets the map id of the map on which the object/shape is being added.

attrs.name: position
attrs.desc: Sets the object's position relative to it's container. Similar results can be obtained by setting margin and margin-... attributes.

attrs.name: shadow
attrs.desc: Sets whether the object's shadow is visible or not.  Has limited effect on HTML5 implementation.

attrs.name: shadow-alphashadowAlpha
attrs.desc: Sets the transparency of the shadow of the object. Values must range between 0.0 and 1.0, with 0.0 being completely invisible and 1.0 being completely opaque. Please note that values also require the leading 0 before the decimal.

attrs.name: shadow-angleshadowAngle
attrs.desc: Sets the angle of the shadow underneath the object.

attrs.name: shadow-blurshadowBlur
attrs.desc: Sets the blur effect size for the shadow of the object. Has limited effect on HTML5 implementation.

attrs.name: shadow-colorshadowColor
attrs.desc: Sets the color of the shadow of the object.

attrs.name: shadow-distanceshadowDistance
attrs.desc: Sets the distance between the shadow and the object.

attrs.name: width
attrs.desc: Sets the object's width.

attrs.name: x
attrs.desc: Sets the X position of the object.

attrs.name: y
attrs.desc: Sets the Y position of the object.

attrs.name: z-indexzIndex
attrs.desc: Sets the z position of the object. Objects with higher z indexes will appear "above" those with lower z index values.
